message: Episode 12 recording is complete and audio editing is underway. Should be posted by the end of the day Wednesday 5/11.
Episode 12 is online! Feedback greatly appreciated.
@gglobster Success!  I am trying to figure out a way we can have people post the episodes on their own...
@scopatz Yes that would be better for all concerned. We need to limit your thirst for domination, you power-hungry wannabe overlord!
@gglobster I need a good emperor name...  The emperor name I already have was taken a while back.
Seriously though, we are reworking our IT infrastructure at Enthought, and I am lobbying to get some inSCIght space.
